title: Pixel 3xl issues with delay in sleep and wake up
content:
Pixel 3xl delay in going to sleep after pressing the power button and also delay in wake up like it takes 10 secs to go to sleep and 10 sec to wake up but if i connect the charger it seems to work fine again. 
And also it work well like normal when it's awake until it goes back to sleep again.
What the heck is going on?
Is this a software bug or hardware?
I don't understand at all...
Anyone solution? Please Help!
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
